articles.title: WhatsApp launches IFCN chatbot to contain COVID-19 related misinformation and fake news - India Today
articles.description: WhatsApp launched a chatbot called the IFCN chatbot to curb the spread of misinformation, which is developed by the Poynter Institute’s International Fact-Checking Network (IFCN).
